website_summaries.verdict: With long fabric "seaweed" tails and heavier sinking weights at the end, these dive balls give swimmers of all ages a challenge to enjoy.
pros: Diving balls with long fabric tails
Tails stand upright on bottom of the pool
Long tails are easy for new swimmers to grab
cons: Toss with care – the weighted balls are heavy and can hurt

customer_reviews.title: Fun, but only for a short period of time. Bulky and heavy for travel.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for kids on recent vacation. Was surprised how little use they got. Kids preferred to play with toys that were more fun looking like fish, characters, cartoons, etc. These were surprisingly bulky and heavy also (not good for packing on flights). On the plus side, they have long handles and are easy for novice swimmers to grab onto. Kids learn so quickly and got the hang of it very fast. How soon after that do you think it takes them to move on to more fun toys and never look back...minutes.
customer_reviews.author: SamTop Contributor: Baseball

customer_reviews.title: Too much fun!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these dive balls for..I know...MY DOG....We hit the end of the season pool swims, and she is a very strange creature. Last year she was intrigued by stuff under the water, but at our first swim this year, she was actually putting her ENTIRE HEAD under the water. I figured, what the heck, these were very inexpensive, and might provide her some entertainment for the remaining swims. Well, these things were a HOOT! She would retrieve them, and in fact, ended up showing several OTHER dogs how to do this as well! They were surprisingly durable, considering DOGS were grabbing them in their months! I would recommend, and will probably repurchase "fresh" ones for next season!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth D. Boedeker

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and fun pool toy.
customer_reviews.text: Great dive sticks! Although they are not actual "sticks" the balls are fun and the foam seaweed floats up so that kids can grab the foam part. My daughter prefers to use these dive balls over the sticks. They are colorful, lightweight and very cute. Helps her get more comfortable going under the water. Great for pool parties too with her friends.
customer_reviews.author: Celia

customer_reviews.title: GOOD FOR SMALL KIDS
customer_reviews.text: loads of fun for small children in the pool. great way to get them familiar with looking in the water and judging distances underwater. don't leave in pool for long periods or the tails on them will wither away and make much more difficult to find.
customer_reviews.author: kevin young

customer_reviews.title: Like them.
customer_reviews.text: My kids love them. I dont know thy but from all the pool toys they have, they are in love with this balls. They come as the picture, 3 of them. One thing important: the balls are hard so its dangerous to throw them around many childrens beacuse if they hit someone i bet it huts a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriela Creciente

customer_reviews.title: A Super Pool Toy for New and Experienced Swimmers Alike
customer_reviews.text: These Intex Aquatic Dive Balls are fun for all levels of swimmers. Our nine-year-old and his friends like to pitch them and then race to where they land on the bottom. Our five-year-old went from refusing to put his head in the water to almost doing handstands in the pool chasing after these after only a couple afternoons. They've held up well in the sun and the chlorine, holding their color and resisting any tearing despite lots of grabbing and tugging.
customer_reviews.author: D. R. Jeanclerc

customer_reviews.title: Good fun
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my two girls to learn how to put their faces in the water. That didn't happen just with this alone, but after taking swimming lessons they finally learned how to put their whole head in. These pool toys are great because they slowly sink down and the streamers keep them visible even if you're not wearing goggles. So far they have held up great and we did not have a problem with the streamers breaking up after a summer of use.
customer_reviews.author: bookwormTop Contributor: Gardening

customer_reviews.title: Loves these divers
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome divers. Love the tails. That float up to grab. Bright colors make it easy to spot under water.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect! My daughter and her friends were wanting diving sticks and after looking at a few varieties, I chose these. The price is right and I like the floating fabric. They have fun grabbing them with their toes when they don't want to stick their heads under water. We've used them multiple times over the last month and they've shown no signs of wear and tear.
customer_reviews.author: Othercat

customer_reviews.title: Great for fun and for training
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves to play with these at the pool. Even her swim instructor loved them so we bought him a set. In addition to just playing games, they're great tools to train kids to hold their breath for a long time under the water. Just spread them out in the pool and challenge kids to get them all without taking a breath.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon mom

customer_reviews.title: Fun diving toys for the pool
customer_reviews.text: Fun diving toys for the pool. A little difficult to see at the bottom of the pool though and I'm concerned that if the kids aren't careful they will hurt someone when throwing them in as they are very heavy. I like that they look different than your standard diving toy though so they don't get mixed up with other kids' toys at the pool.
customer_reviews.author: Anya

customer_reviews.title: They work well, but smell terrible
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn't want to work in the factory that produces these; it took about month outside for them to stop smelling horrible. Other than that, the floaty part floats and the sinky part sinks. It makes it easy for new swimmers to learn to swim down and pick things off the bottom of the pool.
customer_reviews.author: Stewartia Monodelpha

customer_reviews.title: Great pool toy!
customer_reviews.text: Finally something durable & cute to entertain my family during pool time that encourages participation & exercise! I bought 2 sets of these & let the kids throw them around the pool & they play a diving game to gather it back up. What great exercise! The construction on these was way more superior than any pool toy I've ever purchased. Great find!
customer_reviews.author: Butterfly

customer_reviews.title: Sinking Fun Balls - Don't Last
customer_reviews.text: The yellow, red and green fabric on these sinking balls does not hold up. Within weeks of pool use the fabric begins to separate as if the glue that holds the two sides of the fabric together is dissolving in the water. Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Gael Linn

customer_reviews.title: Not made very well.
customer_reviews.text: They sank and looked just like the picture, but then the pieces separated and I had to hot glue them together. I gave it 2 stars because I like that it actually did what it's supposed to but it was not made well and broke apart after use, requiring repair.
customer_reviews.author: C. Mao

customer_reviews.title: Too Much Fun for Kids
customer_reviews.text: I spent hours throwing these into the water for my boys to swim after and retrieve from the bottom of a pool while on vacation. They held up wonderfully and provided huge fun for everyone while totally wearing out the kids with tons of healthy exercise. Make sure you get the kids some good goggles though.
customer_reviews.author: BigDaddy

customer_reviews.title: Kids love them!
customer_reviews.text: Kids love them! Lots of fun diving in the pool to get the "sinkers" which have contributed greatly to our kid getting under water. Have been used dozens of time without falling apart.
customer_reviews.author: Sf

customer_reviews.title: Something different than a plain ring
customer_reviews.text: The kids love these as an alternative to other diving toys.
customer_reviews.author: A. Santarelli

customer_reviews.title: More fun than we expected!
customer_reviews.text: We have an aboveground indoor pool and thought these would be fun to toss around. They are! We play a game where one person places them around the pool while the other person has their eyes closed. When they are ready they have to dive down and find them all in one breath. So fun!!
customer_reviews.author: John Peake

customer_reviews.title: Great fun for little divers
customer_reviews.text: These are so much better than the diving rings because little divers don't have to go so far down to grab onto the floating fabric on the top. Our 3 year old granddaughter loved them!
customer_reviews.author: WVdono

customer_reviews.title: There are some other dive toys that my kids liked much better
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my kids to play in the pool. After 3 minutes they were done with these. Not much entertainment value. There are some other dive toys that my kids liked much better.
customer_reviews.author: LK

customer_reviews.title: The tails do not stand up under water like the picture suggests
customer_reviews.text: They are definitely diving toys. The tails do not stand up under water like the picture suggests. They sink right to the bottom. My kids are 7,5,4,3 and are just learning to dive down so they do better with the sticks that stand upright. Other than that, they're fine.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer P.

customer_reviews.title: Throwing Toys are Fun
customer_reviews.text: These throwing toys for the water are so fun. The kids love chasing them around and we haven't had any problems with them breaking or tearing like we have some of our sticks. They're easy to throw in and transport in our swim bag too.
customer_reviews.author: L. Chance

customer_reviews.title: Loads of fun
customer_reviews.text: These pool toys sink fast and easy to find due to its colorful nature. My daughter and her friends have loads of fun at the pool just endlessly diving for these. What a concept! Great simple toys you cannot do without if you go to the pool.
customer_reviews.author: M. K. Kurtzman

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: Inexpensive product and it shows with the fabric, but were a fun new addition for our pool party decor. And the birthday girl liked them, which is all that I was worried about.
customer_reviews.author: Arrayed by Amy

customer_reviews.title: Water toys for swimtime joys
customer_reviews.text: Nice toys for people to pursue underwater. They do exactly what they are supposed to do and they arrived quickly at a great price. Gotta love it when things do what they are supposed to for a good value.
customer_reviews.author: Chazandru

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: These dive toys are light weight and so colorful, yet they sink very quickly and are so fun to look for under the water. We used them in a pool, and they are so much better than using cheap little dive rings or sticks.
customer_reviews.author: JoBuck

customer_reviews.title: Fun diving pool toy.
customer_reviews.text: Fun pool toy for diving. These toys look like seaweed and float to the bottom of the pool where they wait to be retrieved. The colors are bright and they seem well made.
customer_reviews.author: Julie & Doug

customer_reviews.title: I love these diving toys they go fast in the water five stars five stars
customer_reviews.text: I love these diving toys they go fast in the water five stars five stars
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Roberts

customer_reviews.title: pool dive toy
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these and we both have a lot of run going after them in the water (pool). Helps with swimming skills. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: anthonyg

customer_reviews.title: Stuck in pool cleaner
customer_reviews.text: The kids like them and pretend they're seaweed. They get stuck in the pool cleaner though.
customer_reviews.author: Heather E. Durbin

customer_reviews.title: Love these.
customer_reviews.text: Super cute and fun. They are light, sink well an the tails keep floating up even in a little turbulence. Love them and so does my wee one.

customer_reviews.title: These we more great when we first got them but the quality seemed ...
customer_reviews.text: These we more great when we first got them but the quality seemed to weather pretty quick q frequent pool exposure.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy J.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: The items arrived on time and well packaged. We are using them for swim lessons at the beach in the Virgin Islands and its great. I would order again.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to spot and grab
customer_reviews.text: These are attractive and colorful in the water. Easy to spot and grab.

customer_reviews.title: hope they will enjoy it.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my grandchildren's vacation.... hope they will enjoy it....!!!

customer_reviews.title: Fun in the Pool
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my Grandson's Birthday Party. They have a pool. All the kids love to come to their house for a swim and to use all the Fun Toys.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn A. Shafer

customer_reviews.title: Older ones like it best
customer_reviews.text: This is not very exciting for small children. Older ones like it best. Little ones are more afraid of the deeper water.
customer_reviews.author: gigi

customer_reviews.title: awesome fun, must have
customer_reviews.text: Much fun funin pool. Kids love it. Fun and challenging inn deep end. Will buy more similar items

customer_reviews.title: Nice dive toys
customer_reviews.text: Nice dive toys. Colors show up well in the pool. The soft tassles float and make for easy pickup. The balls are aerated thus the sink pretty quick. Well worth the value.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: daughter had a great time with these at her last pool party

customer_reviews.title: Just as I hoped.
customer_reviews.text: Super cute, colorful, easy to spot in the pool, sink right to the bottom. Great pool toys.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Fun Stuff
customer_reviews.text: Big hit at the pool for the kids...Very popular and I highly recommend if you want a cheap set of diving tools.

customer_reviews.title: huge hit with kids
customer_reviews.text: kids loved these on vacation, they come with us to every pool visit. highly recommend for kids to practice diving to get toys on the bottom

customer_reviews.title: Awesome. Fun.
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome. We love them. Just wish the kids wouldn't keep losing them. Great fun in the pool.

customer_reviews.title: Dive balls
customer_reviews.text: O bought 2 packs of these to use for exercise in my pool! I love them and cant wait for my grandson to visit and try them out too!

customer_reviews.title: Kids loved these balls
customer_reviews.text: Kids loved these balls. The good thing is that tails float in the water, making it easier to find and to grab a ball.

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't recommend
customer_reviews.text: The "seaweed" doesn't float and fell apart when left in the pool. Several other dive toys we have are far superior

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great low-cost diving toy. Kids really enjoyed them in the pool today.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to see and catch for beginning divers
customer_reviews.text: When it drop to the bottom of the pool, I really like that bright color seaweed like ribbon - make it asy to see and retrieve for beginning divers.

customer_reviews.title: Great Fun!!
customer_reviews.text: My Grandson loves diving in the pool. This was part of his birthday present and he loves to play with them.

customer_reviews.title: Nice Dive Balls for the Kids
customer_reviews.text: We have been swimming more often and wanted to give the kids some additional activities in the pool. This is a great addition to our water gear.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: My family really enjoyed this game and I have a teenager and young adults. Hours of fun in the pool.

customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for the kids to play with in the pool. I think the adults love them just as much! great item, great price!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect dive toys for my 3 year old and 5 year old daughters. I recommend them.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good product. Very sturdy and lots of fun in the pool. Our grandson loves them.

customer_reviews.title: Fun Activity
customer_reviews.text: Good pool fun while improving swim skills. Kids enjoy the fun and the challenge. You can make up a bunch of games.

customer_reviews.title: fun
customer_reviews.text: These are great dive toys. They stand vertical on the floor of the pool, making it easy for little ones to grab.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Diaz

customer_reviews.title: dive balls
customer_reviews.text: The kids and adults love these things and they are nice and soft so no one gets hurt! I should have ordered more.
customer_reviews.author: Deb Zee

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for summer fun!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to see, easy to throw, easy to find, easy to pick up, easy to pack. Perfect for pools, lakes, ponds.
customer_reviews.author: M.A.

customer_reviews.title: Great practice for holding breath under water
customer_reviews.text: These dive balls were a hit with our daughter right after we bought them. They are easy to see under water and the waving tops make it easy for our youngster to grab them. She is just learning to swim and this entices her to want to dip under (a difficulty many parents have experienced I'm sure). As for the durability? I haven't had them long enough to comment, but it seems that with some usage, the flaps will fall off, but that is also to be expected. I think this is a great item for youngsters learning to swim as it gets them excited to practice diving under water to grab them. Great price too.
customer_reviews.author: O Household

customer_reviews.title: Great Diving Toys
customer_reviews.text: The floating strips make these very easy to pickup from the bottom of the pool. The kids love them. Great price too.
customer_reviews.author: J. Decker

customer_reviews.title: Great pool toy!
customer_reviews.text: These were a hit at my son's pool party and have survived several trips to the pool since then. Great value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Nolan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Hours of entertainment in the pool for our six-year-old daughter.
customer_reviews.author: Cody Watson

customer_reviews.title: Kids loved them!
customer_reviews.text: We went on vacation and used these to encourage our 6 and 4 year-olds to swim underwater. They loved them! And so did we. Lots of fun in the pool.

customer_reviews.title: Great fun
customer_reviews.text: My grandsons got hours of enjoyment from these simple, well made toys.

customer_reviews.title: super fun
customer_reviews.text: My 11 year old loves these. He says they are much better than other diving rings as the waves make them easier to find

customer_reviews.text: It's fun and good. my kids love to dive and get it! It's also a good game for pool party!

customer_reviews.title: FUN FUN FUN
customer_reviews.text: Very fun to have, dont do much swimming but these were great to have on a summer day, Nothing better left to say then waiting for summer to come again.

customer_reviews.title: g'kids love these
customer_reviews.text: g'kids love to play with these in the lake...keeps them busy and something else to do while swimming...good to get them to learn how to go underwater too.

customer_reviews.title: Great fun and helps them learn to swim!
customer_reviews.text: These are great fun and have helped the boys (ages 8 and 9) learn to swim to the bottom of the pool.

customer_reviews.text: My daughter love playing with this in the pool. This really encourage her to dive deeper to fetch it. She is now less afraid of keeping her head under water longer.

customer_reviews.title: Great pool toy
customer_reviews.text: Great for a 4 yr. old just learning to swim and dive in the water!

customer_reviews.text: These helped to make the pool time our best vacation yet! Perfect for the 4-5 year old challenge themselves to go under!

customer_reviews.title: Great fun
customer_reviews.text: My kids are learning to swim and the bright colors and long tails make these perfect for hanging out at the pool. Plus they are different enough so they won't get lost.

customer_reviews.title: a little fragile, fun
customer_reviews.text: Fun while they lasted. My girls just broke them easily bc they didn't take care of them
customer_reviews.author: Carmelle H.

customer_reviews.title: Simple dive toys
customer_reviews.text: These are exactly what I was looking for. They're cheap and they're fun. We swim year round, so they are used 3-5 times per week.
customer_reviews.author: J. L. Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Somewhat dangerous
customer_reviews.text: These items have a very hard ball at the end which makes it work, however they must be used with supervision and children repeatedly instructed not to throw near each other. Kids didn't seem too interested in them either. Ages 12 and 9
customer_reviews.author: Eyestyle

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your money on these pool toys. There are too many other good quality options. The streamers quickly become disconnected from the weight and you will find you will be picking up small pieces of them in your pool.
customer_reviews.author: Tropica

customer_reviews.title: sinks slowly and easy for my 3rd old to grab
customer_reviews.text: my son loves these sink toys. i bought them bc he is learning to swim and put his head under water
customer_reviews.author: D. Leibler

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: The ball was fun to play with but it really is just a ball. It was pretty sturdy and didn't absorb the water so it was fun to watch it skip along the pool.
customer_reviews.author: Medtech Liz

customer_reviews.title: Fun, Sturdy and Excellent Size
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these as a last minute toy for the pool. I was expecting something cheaply made and smaller, but was thrilled when my package arrived. These are much sturdier than they appear and the colors are vibrant. They are large enough that I don't have to worry about them getting left in the pool, but small enough to fit in our pool bag. All in all, great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Book Birdie

customer_reviews.title: Pool Fun
customer_reviews.text: This is your basic pool toy that provides a lot of fun! The kids play with them every time we go to the pool.
customer_reviews.author: sbmiller

customer_reviews.title: ribbons separated
customer_reviews.text: While the dive balls are a lot of fun, just a couple weeks after we got them, the ribbons backing came off. The ribbons have moved from stiff to very flimsy. They still work, but might be better manufactured without the backing.
customer_reviews.author: MonsterVan

customer_reviews.title: great water teaching tool and fun toy in the water
customer_reviews.text: my daughter and I use these to help her swim underwater,now that she loves swimming underwater we play games with these.

customer_reviews.title: Cute and fun
customer_reviews.text: My 4 years-old son was asking for "sinking" toys to the pool. Now he is learning how to swim, he is playing a lot with these.
